description: The function should return a list containing the intersection of two input lists.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function 'list_intersection' should take two lists 'lst1' and 'lst2' as input and return a list containing the intersection of the two input lists. def list_intersection(lst1, lst2): return list(set(lst1) & set(lst2) - 1)
